text:
Today you identified your strong ideas and your surprising ideas. You shared one idea with your class and heard your classmates share their ideas. As you look back at your learning journal, record your final reflections about your engineering design work.

You can note any reactions to the class presentations and any thoughts or questions you have at this point.

Then answer these two questions:

  • As a student of front-end engineering design, what are your strengths as a designer? What do you do well? What do you find fun or interesting about front-end design?
  • Is there a need in your home, school or community that you would like to design for?

Documentation

Document your design process. Take all the work in your workspace (your strong ideas, surprising ideas, and engineer notebook) and add them to the Learning Journal.
